Update2.UpdateDesc:
~Added some Owner stuff
   -Added Spam protection in Cross server chats
     -Also added a timeout system, Dont spam the Send chat button
       For every message sent = Larger time added to your timeout
   -Adding* a Chat Block system
   -Fixed some GUI bugs, and some issues that were in pcall's
 
~Added Notify to the game (Check my Assets page for it)
  -Side note: My version of notify will be renamed, and will function
   Different soon enough, for now im using V1.03.
  -Along with that ill be updating the Design of the NotifyGUI to my new
   theme

~Still working on adding the Suggest and report API, but The GUI was built During a time when i wasnt paying much attention for building up.
  Rather i was just making things and moving on. 
  -so it will need a revamp

Update1.UpdateDesc:
~No Longer using Unstable code
 ~Alot of Server side stuff has been added
 
 ~New MainMenu Features
  ~Cross Server Chatting and Cross Server PLAY -(Still in Early-Access)!
  ~New GUI Designes, and Mobile now supported 99% of the time
  ~Ability to Add stuff to the menu later on, alot of flexability added
 
 ~Upcoming Update
   ~Terrain Gen V3
  	~Adding the Ability to buy "Regions" of terrain
  	~Adding a Menu button for Chunk/Property Managment
  	~Adding Trees with Growth System, Similar to LT2 but a bit more advanced
  	~Adding Ore Pools that Give out Chances of ore, 
  	 Example: hills Can contain Alot Gold But Flatlands will contain low gold and high Iron
     ~Adding Items that can be picked up(Later on Items will be draggable)
     ~Working on the Discord support Channel for Banned players(If you would like to help Please visit the Discord)
      This Server does not Allow chatting for now, It is just an appeal and staff server.
      
      I plan on using a Roblox Safe Authenicater, if i cannot do that i plan on doing "Banned Servers",
      Players that are banned will be sent here so they can appeal if needed
     
     ~SPOILER! Will try adding an Advanced ecoSystem of animals and Fauna
      If this is added, there will be a part 2 with Player Survival Mechanics.
      Other wise the Ecosystem stuff will be its own update
